EmailTemplate.name: 202011_EMEAI_LinkedIn_AMAC_JetWave_MC.Auto-Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Infographic from AMAC, a Honeywell Authorized Dealer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for downloading the Infographic from AMAC, a Honeywell Authorized Dealer with lots of expertise on JetWave installation. To receive a copy of the infographic, please click the link below.
Let’s Connect:
Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to stay in the loop with us, and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. DOWNLOAD THE INFOGRAPHIC <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/landing-pages/brochures/AMAC_AND_JETWAVE_INSTALLATION_CENTER_OF_EXCELLENCE.pdf]]> Please contact aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> if you experience any issue downloading the asset.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace
